name: Lovely Fangs
description:
You play as Klaus, a friendly vampire who is hunted down by the military, robots and even magical beings like fairys.

A  huge disease caused by a portal is spreading fast, and your fangs are the only thing that can stop that, the thing is, if you lose them, you are dead.

This is my first game, i would like to hear any feedback and learn more about developing games, this version lacks a story mode, maybe some day i can add it.
